name: Lemon Garlic Potato Wedges
description: Skip drive-through fries and grab an air fryer to make perfectly crisp wedges. Keep the potato skins on (don’t peel ‘em!) to bump up the fibre: about half of a potato’s fibre content is from the skin! Make your dunking game strong—serve with extra dippers like Creamy Ranch Dip or Roasted Garlic Aioli.

ingredients.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken Seasoning or Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning, divided

preparation:
1. Preheat air fryer to 400° F. 
  2. Slice unpeeled potatoes lengthwise into wedges. Place wedges in a large bowl; sprinkle with 1⁄2 package seasoning and oil. Toss to coat.  
  3. Cook 12–15 min, until wedges are tender, shaking basket halfway through.  
  4. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine remaining seasoning and yogurt. Serve as a dipping sauce for fries.
tips: Streamline cook time and pre-cook wedges in the Multipurpose Steamer for 5 min before adding to the air fryer. Fry just until crispy, about 3 min.
